description: Members of the Inter-American Convention for the Protection and Conservation of Sea Turtles (IAC), in the Americas as of 31 December 2017. The IAC is an intergovernmental treaty which provides the legal framework for countries in the American Continent to take actions in benefit of these species. The IAC was signed in Salvador, Brazil in 2001 and entered into force in May of 2001.
name: CLME: Inter-American Sea Turtle Convention Members
